videos.title: Debounce Function in JavaScript - JavaScript Job Interview question
videos.description: In this video, I have explained about the debounce function in JavaScript. This is a common question interviewers ask at Job Interviews. If you watch this video carefully, you will understand what is debounce and how to handle it with custom debounce function.

videos.title: #2 JavaScript Tips and Tricks - JavaScript Job Interview Questions
videos.description:
JavaScript Tips and Tricks - JavaScript Job Interview Questions - Bangla Tutorial 
In this video, I have shown 8 more JavaScript pro tips that will make a JavaScript Developer's life easier.

videos.title: Facing the Future: The Truth About Artificial Intelligence and Our Jobs - Bangla
videos.description: This video explores the impact of artificial intelligence on employment, examining the history of automation and the current state of AI technology. The video aims to provide a balanced perspective on the topic, helping viewers understand the truth about AI's impact on jobs and offering advice on how to prepare for the changing job market. This video also answers the most common questions asked by programmers worldwide - "Will AI take my job?"

videos.title: #01 Introduction | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial
videos.description: This is the introduction video of Learn with Sumit Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial Course. In this video, you will get detail instructions about how to follow this playlist, course outline, what are the prerequisites to learn Tailwind CSS and what to expect from this course.

videos.title: #02 Tailwind Installation | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial
videos.description: In this video of Learn with Sumit Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial Course, you will get detail instructions on how to install Tailwind CSS. Amongst various ways to install Tailwind, this video shows how to install tailwind css with Tailwind CLI or Command Line Interface.

videos.title: #03 Utility-First Approach | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial
videos.description: This is the 3rd video of "Learn with Sumit Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial Course". In this video, I have described the fundamental concept of Tailwind CSS - the Utility-First Design Approach - which is where Tailwind is different from other CSS frameworks like Bootstrap or Material UI.

videos.title: #04 Responsive variants - Tailwind Breakpoints | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial
videos.description: This is the 4th video of "Learn with Sumit Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial Course". In this video, you will get a clear concept about how responsiveness is handled in Tailwind. Tailwind gives us several device breakpoints which we can target to achieve responsiveness easily and efficiently.

quizzes.question: Which of the following is an example of a situation where you would use the Debounce function?
quizzes.video_title: #03 Utility-First Approach | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial

options.option: A search bar where the results are displayed as you type.
A button that performs an action when clicked.
An animation that plays when a user hovers over an element.

quizzes.question: What is the difference between null and undefined in JavaScript?
quizzes.video_title: #2 JavaScript Tips and Tricks - JavaScript Job Interview Questions

options.option: null represents the intentional absence of any object value.
undefined represents the uninitialized value of a variable or property.

quizzes.question:
1.1 - এখানে কয়টি এবং কি কি স্টেট হতে পারে?
ধরুন আপনার রিয়্যাক্ট দিয়ে বানানো ওয়েব পেইজে একটি বাটন আছে। সেটাতে ক্লিক করলে একটি মোডাল ওপেন হবে। আবার মোডাল এর ভিতরে একটি ক্লোজ বাটন আছে সেটিতে ক্লিক করলে মোডাল ক্লোজ হবে। এছাড়া মোডাল এর ভিতরে একটি ফর্ম আছে যেখানে ২ টি ফর্ম ফিল্ড - 'name' এবং 'age' আছে এবং একটি সাবমিট বাটন আছে। ফর্ম এর সাবমিট বাটনে ক্লিক করলে ফর্ম এর ডাটা নিয়ে কনসোলে দেখাবে এবং একটি সাকসেস মেসেজ দেখাবে যে ফর্ম সাবমিট হয়েছে। এখন আপনাকে বলতে হবে এই ছোট এপ্লিকেশনে কয়টি এবং কি কি স্টেট থাকতে পারে?
